body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. you aren't safe from roblox copypastas anywhere

En verdad da rabia que no solo el padre, sino tambien esas zorras estan ayudando al padre a quitarle la novia al MC.

Se organizaron somo para tenderle esa trampa.

Que les importa a ellas y al padre lo que haga el.

El solo quiere ser feliz el no se mete con ellos mas bien los aguanta pero  no pueden soportar que el sea feliz con una chica.

La tiene jodido el MC con tantos enemigos en su contra.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse

what a piece of shit that Miki or whatever is her name. Setting up Mc like that so Fmc would see him with another woman and make her come back to the harem.
I need part 3 now! 😭
